name: Trash Trasher
description: Pick up one 60L bag of trash from the streets

name: No Car Crew
description: Don't drive a car for a week

name: Short Showers
description: Your showers should not be longer than 5 mins for a week!

name: No Heat Feast
description: Don't turn on the heater in your house for a week!

name: Tree Titans
description: Contribute to the world by having one tree planted

name: No Waste Mate
description: Don't throw away any leftovers for a week,  find a solution!
